response.overview: 2022 Pinoy Pop Convention (PPOP CON) is a 2-day hybrid event happening from 9 to 10 April 2022. The Concert will be at the Araneta Coliseum on 10 April 2022, 3PM â€“ 7PM PHT. The Convention will be at the New Frontier Theater starting 9 April 2022, 10AM PHT until 10 April 2022, 8PM PHT. Fan activities will be happening simultaneously at both venues and on livestream. Expect performances, merchandise selling, fan booths and activities, games, and surprises.
response.title: PPOP CON
